action.action-desc: Mr. Lawler introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to expand eligibility for entitlement to a headstone or grave marker under the laws administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to certain members of a Reserve of an Armed Force, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Giving Reservists A Valiant Eternity Act or the GRAVE Act.

section.header: Expansion of entitlement to headstone or grave marker under laws administered by Secretary of Veterans Affairs
section.text: Paragraph (5) of section 2306(a) of title 38, United States Code, is amended to read as follows:

paragraph.text: A member (or former member) of a Reserve of an Armed Force who is not a veteran solely by reason of not meeting the minimum active-duty service requirements under section 5303A of this title.
